article_text:
About this blog

By Jay H Givan

After college (NH), and living in Los Angeles, Mr. Givan has been a manufacturer's sales rep in the commercial sound and security industry. He has played the drums since age 8, played his share of sports, and has been interested in news & politics ...

article_metadata.description: Presidential hopeful Donald J. Trump energized a full house Wednesday night at the DCU Center in Worcester – the birthplace of the Massachusetts republican party. Trump took the stage to 'We're Not Gonna Take It' blasting out of the house p.a., though a little late as to allow 4,000 ticket holders still waiting in line [...]
